subject: Re: [junit] How to delete an object in the test fixture?
msgSnippet: ... each test. ... You should probably add a static method to the Singleton that creates a new instance and leaves the old one to the garbage collector. A much
messageBody:
> in JUnit, I understand how setup and teardown work for each test method.
>
> I want to delete an object in the test fixture in my teardown method.
> This object is a singleton that needs to be created at the beginning of
each test.
>
> How do I do this in JUnit?

You should probably add a static method to the Singleton that creates a new
instance and leaves the old one to the garbage collector.
A much better solution if you can apply it: don't make it a Singleton
(http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?SingletonsAreEvil).

---------------
Paolo Perrotta
Bologna, Italy
